attributes.action: Speak out against Trump lifting the ban on elephant imports.
attributes.background: Protection of our wildlife is important, these creatures are defenceless and should not be hunted for pure sport.  The Trump administration has lifted the law Obama set to stop elephant imports very well knowing this will increase the deaths of more elephants.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

As we understand it, President Trump has not yet made this decision.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask the Government to urge President Trump to maintain the ban.
